titlestmt.titleproper: Finding Aid for the Association of Academic Women. Constitution and Revisions. 1945-1980.
Academic Women (Association of). Constitution and Revisions.
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by University Archives staff, 1987 August; finding aid revised by Katharine A. Lawrie, 2013 January; machine-readable finding aid created by Katharine A. Lawrie, 2014 April.

address.addressline: Room A1713, Charles E. Young Research Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2014-04-10T14:44-0700

did.unittitle: Association of Academic Women. Constitution and Revisions.
did.abstract: Record Series 71 contains the original constitution of the Association of Academic Women and its revisions.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: COLLECTION STORED OFF-SITE AT SRLF: Open for research. Advance notice required for access. Contact the UCLA Library Special Collections Reference Desk for paging information.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Copyright of portions of this collection has been assigned to The Regents of the University of California. The UCLA University Archives can grant permission to publish for materials to which it holds the copyright. All requests for permission to publish or quote must be submitted in writing to the UCLA University Archivist.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Association of Academic Women. Constitution and Revisions (University Archives Record Series 71). UCLA Library Special Collections, University Archives.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Association of Academic Women (AAW) was founded by a group of women faculty at UCLA. The purpose of the AAW was to advance the professional interest of its members, represent women faculty to the University, and provide an opportunity for its members to meet and exchange ideas with each other. While the association

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Record Series 71 contains the original constitution of the Association of Academic Women and its revisions.
This is an active record series; additional University records are expected to be added.
